2.text: Add 2 tablespoons (30 grams) of petroleum jelly, 1 teaspoon (5 grams) of shea butter, and ¼ teaspoon (1.25 milliliters) of coconut oil to the bowl.
2.vid: /1/1c/Make Lip Gloss with Petroleum Jelly Step 10 Version 5.360p.mp4

3.text: Melt the petroleum jelly, butter, and oil over medium heat.

4.text: Take the melted mixture off heat, and stir in some color or flavor, if desired.
4.vid: /3/33/Make Lip Gloss with Petroleum Jelly Step 12 Version 6.360p.mp4

5.text: Pour the mixture quickly into a clean, empty container.
5.vid: /3/3c/Make Lip Gloss with Petroleum Jelly Step 13 Version 5.360p.mp4

6.text: Let the lip balm cool before you use it.

7.text: Put 2 tablespoons  (30 grams) of petroleum jelly into a small, microwave-safe bowl.

8.text: Cut off a small piece of lipstick, and add it to the bowl.
8.vid: /a/af/Make Lip Gloss with Petroleum Jelly Step 2 Version 5.360p.mp4

9.vid: /6/6d/Make Lip Gloss with Petroleum Jelly Step 3 Version 3.360p.mp4

10.text: Stir the mixture with a spoon until it is smooth.

11.text: Add a few drops of almond oil and 3 to 5 drops of flavoring.
11.vid: /8/82/Make Lip Gloss with Petroleum Jelly Step 5 Version 5.360p.mp4

12.text: Stir with a spoon until everything is smooth and evenly mixed together.
12.vid: /b/b5/Make Lip Gloss with Petroleum Jelly Step 6 Version 5.360p.mp4

13.text: Pour the mixture to a small container.
13.vid: /9/94/Make Lip Gloss with Petroleum Jelly Step 7 Version 5.360p.mp4

14.text: Wait for the mixture to harden before you use it.

15.text: Place 2 tablespoons (30 grams) of petroleum jelly into a small, microwave-safe bowl.
15.vid: /9/9d/Make Lip Gloss with Petroleum Jelly Step 15 Version 6.360p.mp4

16.text: Put the bowl into the microwave, heat it for 30 seconds, then stir it with a spoon.

17.text: Stir in up to 1 packet/envelope of drink mix.
17.vid: /f/ff/Make Lip Gloss with Petroleum Jelly Step 17 Version 6.360p.mp4

18.text: Pour the mixture into a clean, small, empty container.

19.text: Let the mixture cool before you use it.

20.text: Add 2 tablespoons  (30 grams) of petroleum jelly into a small bowl.
20.vid: /f/f1/Make Lip Gloss with Petroleum Jelly Step 20 Version 6.360p.mp4

21.text: Find some powdered eyeshadow or blush.
21.vid: /6/6e/Make Lip Gloss with Petroleum Jelly Step 21 Version 6.360p.mp4

22.text: Stir the eyeshadow into the petroleum jelly.
22.vid: /f/f5/Make Lip Gloss with Petroleum Jelly Step 22 Version 6.360p.mp4

23.text: Transfer the mixture to a small container.

24.text: Let the lip gloss harden, then use it whenever you want a touch of color or sparkle on your lips.
